context: DoorDash, Inc. is a food delivery and local commerce platform focused on restaurant delivery, grocery, convenience, and merchant services. Local commerce platform. Competing with Uber Eats, Instacart.

competitors.name: Uber Eats
competitors.notes: Primary competitor globally, part of Uber's broader mobility platform

competitors.name: Instacart
competitors.notes: Grocery and retail delivery competitor with advertising business

competitors.name: Amazon
competitors.notes: Competing through Prime delivery, Whole Foods, and Amazon Fresh

competitors.name: Walmart
competitors.notes: Massive grocery delivery operation through Spark and partnerships

competitors.name: Gopuff
competitors.notes: Quick commerce platform for convenience items

competitors.name: Grubhub
competitors.notes: Legacy food delivery platform seeking strategic alternatives
